__e: So let me go out there and do it, or I'll do it right here.
I know that if we don't go out there and do something, as you've got it set up, and you're blowing and coming in here. I know that.
Give me one thing, and then... You can walk out that door and you'll never see me again.
However, if you remain calm and do exactly as I say, I promise you'll leave here with a rip-roaring story to tell your friends and families.
If you could close the door on the way out, that'd be great.
Don't let the door hit you on the way out, Logan.
